price: 33. Quant à celui qui est venu apporter la vérité et ceux qui y ont accordé créance, ceux-là sont les gens pieux.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِي جَآءَ بِٱلصِّدۡقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī jāa bil-ṣid'qi waṣaddaqa bihi ulāika humu al-mutaqūna
